name: ShineG In Bumpercat
description:
The way to portray characters has changed which is the "important adjustment" in this game.The first game "ShineG In The Zombies" is compared with this one.
Author's message: Hello.I am Louie,the producer of ShineG series.This is the sixth product of ShineG.

1.Thank you for your support.
2.I upgrade the game graphics.And I add local multiplayer mode to game.
3.I also design the new content of the game.Game description: Shine entered the world of catgirl by wearing a cat's hair band.And Shine started new battle.

1.This is an action game.It supports multiplayer fighting.You can attack your opponents by hitting and launching bombs.
You will win the game when all enemies fall into the sea.
2.The characters will wear swimsuits in this game.All characters are catgirls except Shine.(You can take photos when the characters are falling into the water.)
3.There are 40 maps in the game.Maps have different shapes and different items.
4.There are many weapons and items in game.
5.The game has single player mode and local multiplayer mode.At present, 4 person can split screen to battle in the game.
